Header: Financial assistance to disaster struck people of the North
Content: The handing over of financial assistance to the Northern civilians impacted by the adverse weather took place today under the patronage of Speaker Karu Jayasuriya. The Speaker toured the Kilinochchi area today to inquire into the granting of relief to the families affected by the disaster. It was followed by a discussion held at the Kilinochchi District Secretariat. 10,000 rupee cheques were handed over to 90 families on this occasion. Among those present were Minister Daya Gamage and State Minister Vijayakala Maheshwaran.
